item.title: 亚马逊 380 亿美元收购 OpenAI 显示其不再是人工智能领域的落后者
item.description: 亚马逊与 OpenAI 签订了价值 380 亿美元的云计算协议，这标志着这家电子商务巨头的云计算业务在经历了近期的挫折（包括市场份额被竞争对手夺走以及互联网大部分地区中断）之后获得了重大认可。【原文：Amazon's $38 billion cloud deal with OpenAI marks a major endorsement for the e-commerce giant's cloud business after recent setbacks, including ceding market share to rivals and an outage that disrupted large parts of the internet.】

item.title: 美国机场安全管理局（TSA）工作人员度过停摆期，工资和福利优于 2019 年
item.description: 在美国政府停摆期间停薪留职的机场安检员的财务状况比 2019 年上一次长期停摆期间要好，这要归功于薪酬和福利的改善。【原文：Airport security screeners working without pay during the U.S. government shutdown are in a stronger financial position than they were during the last prolonged closure in 2019, thanks to improvements in pay and benefits.】

item.title: 山姆-班克曼-弗里德的律师将为重新审理 FTX 创始人的欺诈案辩护
item.description: FTX 加密货币交易所创始人山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）因诈骗罪被判处 25 年监禁，他的律师将于周二敦促联邦上诉法院撤销对他的定罪。【原文：Lawyers for Sam Bankman-Fried, the FTX cryptocurrency exchange founder serving a 25-year prison sentence for fraud, will urge a federal appeals court on Tuesday to throw out his conviction.】

item.title: Spotify 预测利润高于预期，原因是用户增长和价格上涨
item.description: Spotify 周二预测第四季度利润将高于华尔街预期，押注于强劲的用户增长和关键假日季涨价带来的提振。【原文：Spotify forecast fourth-quarter profit above Wall Street expectations on Tuesday, betting on robust user growth and a boost from price hikes in the crucial holiday season.】

item.title: 船舶供应紧张，冬季需求旺盛，液化天然气运价创数月新高
item.description: 航运界人士表示，由于船只供应紧张、向埃及交付货物的时间推迟以及冬季到来前需求的上升，液化天然气的航运费率已创下多个月来的新高。【原文：Shipping rates for liquefied natural gas have hit multi-month highs on tighter vessel availability, delayed cargo deliveries to Egypt and rising demand ahead of winter, shipping sources said.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利首席执行官警告市场走向修正
item.description: 摩根士丹利首席执行官泰德-皮克（Ted Pick）周二警告说，全球股市可能正走向调整。【原文：Morgan Stanley CEO Ted Pick on Tuesday cautioned that the global equity markets could be heading towards a correction.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司季度净利润下滑，但维持全年业绩展望
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周二公布，第三季度调整后净利润为5440万美元，低于去年同期的2.21亿美元，原因是递延税款等非正常项目以及电动飞机部门夏娃（Eve）的业绩受到影响。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer on Tuesday posted a third-quarter adjusted net income of $54.4 million, down from $221 million a year earlier, citing a hit from extraordinary items such as deferred taxes and results from electric aircraft unit Eve.】

item.title: 盖蒂图片公司在英国人工智能图像生成器诉讼中基本败诉
item.description: 本周二，盖蒂图片公司（Getty Images）在伦敦高等法院对人工智能公司 Stability AI 就其图片生成器提起的具有里程碑意义的诉讼中败诉。【原文：Getty Images largely lost its landmark lawsuit against artificial intelligence company Stability AI over its image generator at London's High Court on Tuesday.】

item.title: 舍弗勒与Neura机器人公司合作开发和供应人形机器人
item.description: 德国机械和汽车零部件制造商舍弗勒（Schaeffler）周二与Neura机器人公司（Neura Robotics）建立合作关系，共同开发和供应人形机器人的关键零部件。【原文：German machine and car parts maker Schaeffler on Tuesday entered into partnership with Neura Robotics to jointly develop and supply key components for humanoids.】

item.title: Beacon 软件公司融资 2.5 亿美元，为 "反私募股权 "的人工智能公司提供资金支持
item.description: Beacon Software 是一家收购小型软件企业并利用人工智能对其进行改造的控股公司，该公司告诉路透社，它已经筹集了 2.5 亿美元，用于资助其人工智能扩展战略。【原文：Beacon Software, a holding company that acquires smaller software businesses and uses artificial intelligence to transform them, has raised $250 million to fund its AI roll-up strategy, the company told Reuters.】

item.title: 从镐头到人工智能，COP30主办国见证亚马逊采矿业的过去与未来
item.description: 卢辛多-利马（Lucindo Lima）的嗓音比他 72 岁的年纪还要年轻，他唱出了他在巴西塞拉佩拉达矿（Serra Pelada mine）从未赚到过的财富。【原文：With a voice more youthful than his 72 years would suggest, Lucindo Lima sings about the untold riches he never made in Brazil's Serra Pelada mine, a site made famous by a 1980s gold rush immortalized by the late photographer Sebastiao Salgado.】

item.title: 独家报道巴基斯坦取消埃尼液化天然气货运，寻求与卡塔尔重新谈判供应事宜
item.description: 据一份官方文件和两个消息来源称，巴基斯坦已达成协议，取消其与意大利埃尼公司长期合同中的 21 批液化天然气货物，作为遏制充斥其天然气网络的过量进口计划的一部分。【原文：Pakistan has struck a deal to cancel 21 liquefied natural gas cargoes under its long-term contract with Italy's Eni as part of a plan to curb excess imports that have flooded its gas network, according to an official document and two sources.】

item.title: 民调显示 47% 的美国人认为美国巨额贸易逆差是经济紧急状况
item.description: 周二公布的一项民意调查显示，约半数美国人认为美国与其他国家的巨额贸易逆差是一种经济紧急状况，而就在这一天，最高法院将审议唐纳德-特朗普总统根据一项针对紧急状况的法律实施的全面关税的合法性。【原文：About half of Americans view the large U.S. trade deficit with other countries as an economic emergency, according to a poll released on Tuesday, a day before the Supreme Court is due to consider the legality of sweeping tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump under a law meant for emergencies.】

item.title: 消息人士称，UltraGreen.ai 开始在新加坡进行超过 3 亿美元的首次公开募股预营销
item.description: 两位直接了解此事的消息人士称，UltraGreen.ai 已开始新加坡首次公开募股的预营销，募集资金可能在 3 亿至 4 亿新元（约合 3.09 亿美元）之间，这家外科成像公司的估值将超过 20 亿新元。【原文：UltraGreen.ai has started pre-marketing for a Singapore initial public offering that could raise between S$300 million and S$400 million ($309 million), valuing the surgical imaging firm at more than S$2 billion, said two sources with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Sarepta 业绩下滑，基因疗法受挫使药物管线雪上加霜
item.description: 周二收盘前，Sarepta 公司的股价下跌了 36%，因为针对一种肌肉萎缩疾病的两种基因靶向疗法的试验未能达到关键目标，这加深了人们对该公司治疗产品线的担忧。【原文：Shares of Sarepta sank 36% before the bell on Tuesday after a trial for two gene-targeted therapies for a muscle-wasting disease missed a key goal, deepening concerns about the company's treatment pipeline.】

item.title: Shein在法国的快时尚之战内幕
item.description: 中国在线时尚平台Shein正加紧在法国的攻势，希望其在巴黎一家百货公司开设的首家永久店铺能帮助抵御立法者对其低成本模式的激烈反对。【原文：Chinese online fashion platform Shein is ramping up its fight in France, gambling that its first permanent shop, in a Paris department store, will help fend off fierce pushback from lawmakers against its low-cost model.】

item.title: 特斯拉 10 月中国产电动汽车销量同比下降 9.9
item.description: 中国乘用车联席会周二公布的数据显示，10月份特斯拉在中国生产的电动汽车销量同比下降9.9%，至61497辆，扭转了9月份2.8%的增长势头。【原文：Tesla's China-made electric vehicle sales fell 9.9% to 61,497 units in October from a year earlier, reversing a 2.8% increase in September, data from the China Passenger Car Association showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称，Stellantis公司因电池起火风险召回逾32万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周二表示，由于吉普牧马人（Jeep Wrangler）和大切诺基（Grand Cherokee）汽车的高压电池可能出现故障，存在起火风险，Stellantis公司将在美国召回32万零65辆吉普牧马人和大切诺基汽车。【原文：Stellantis is recalling 320,065 Jeep Wrangler and Grand Cherokee vehicles in the U.S. due to a potential high-voltage battery failure that could pose a fire risk, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车 10 月份销量下降 2%，称市场仍面临挑战
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司（VOLCARb.ST）周二表示，该公司 10 月份的汽车销量为 60,455 辆，与去年同期相比下降了 2%。【原文：Volvo Cars VOLCARb.ST sold 60,455 cars in October, down 2% compared to the same period last year, the Sweden-based company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 受美国关税影响，丰田利润将连续第二个季度下滑
item.description: 日本丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor）预计将于周三公布连续第二个季度的营业利润下滑，原因是尽管混合动力汽车在全球销售强劲，但美国关税和供应链风险对其运营造成了压力。【原文：Japan's Toyota Motor is expected to post a second consecutive quarterly operating profit decline on Wednesday, as U.S. tariffs and supply-chain risks weigh on its operations despite robust global sales of hybrid vehicles.】

item.title: 英国多米诺比萨公司在艰难市场中实现同类销售额增长
item.description: 本周二，英国多米诺比萨集团（Domino's Pizza Group）发布报告称，由于价格上涨、新产品和忠诚度计划有助于在充满挑战的消费环境中维持需求，该集团第三季度的同类销售额有所增长。【原文：UK's Domino's Pizza Group reported a rise in third-quarter like-for-like sales on Tuesday, as higher prices, new products and loyalty initiatives helped sustain demand in a challenging consumer environment.】

item.title: 尽管盈利增长，但 Palantir 在欧洲的股价仍下跌
item.description: Palantir Technologies 周二在法兰克福早盘交易中下跌近 6%，原因是这家美国科技集团又一次强劲的季度业绩更新未能延续破纪录的涨势。【原文：Palantir Technologies fell almost 6% in early Frankfurt trading on Tuesday, as another strong quarterly update from the U.S. tech group failed to extend its record-breaking rally.】

item.title: 消息人士称，空客需要交付 235 架飞机才能实现年底目标
item.description: 业内人士称，空客公司在今年前 10 个月交付了 585 架飞机，要实现全年 820 架左右的目标，还需交付 235 架飞机。【原文：Airbus delivered 585 airplanes in the first 10 months of the year, industry sources said, leaving 235 left to deliver to reach a target of around 820 for the full year.】

item.title: 炼油利润率助力英国石油公司利润超预期
item.description: 周二，石油巨头英国石油公司（BP）公布的第三季度基本利润降幅小于预期，原因是炼油利润率的提高部分抵消了原油价格下跌的影响。【原文：Oil major BP reported a smaller than expected fall in third-quarter underlying profit on Tuesday as higher refining margins partly offset the impact of lower crude prices.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金将投票反对马斯克的 1 万亿美元特斯拉薪酬方案
item.description: 全球最大的挪威主权财富基金周二表示，将在本周举行的年度股东大会上投票反对批准特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）提出的薪酬方案，其中包含价值高达1万亿美元的股票。【原文：Norway's sovereign wealth fund, the world's largest, said on Tuesday it would vote against ratifying Tesla CEO Elon Musk's proposed compensation package, containing shares worth up to $1 trillion, at an annual general meeting this week.】

item.title: 雨果博斯预计销售额和利润将低于预期目标
item.description: 德国时装集团 Hugo Boss 周二表示，今年的销售额和营业利润将处于其指导目标的下限，第三季度的销售额也低于预期。【原文：German fashion group Hugo Boss on Tuesday said sales and operating profit in the current year would be at the lower end of its guidance and reported lower-than-expected third quarter sales.】

item.title: 任天堂将运营预测上调 16
item.description: 任天堂周二将截至 2026 年 3 月的财政年度的营业利润预期提高了 16%，达到 3,700 亿日元（24.5 亿美元）。【原文：Nintendo on Tuesday hiked its operating profit forecast by 16% to 370 billion yen ($2.45 billion) for the financial year ending March 2026.】

item.title: KKR 称 2025 年 PE 资本分配的一半将来自亚洲
item.description: 全球投资公司 KKR & Co 的联席首席执行官 Joe Bae 周二表示，KKR & Co 今年返还给投资者的私募股权投资资金中，将有一半来自亚洲。【原文：Half of the private equity capital that KKR & Co will return to investors this year will come from Asia, the global investment firm's co-CEO Joe Bae said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 飞利浦季度销售额增长 3
item.description: 荷兰医疗技术公司飞利浦周二公布的第三季度营收符合分析师预期，北美市场表现强劲。【原文：Dutch medical technology company Philips reported third-quarter revenue in line with analysts' expectations un Tuesday, citing a strong performance in North America.】

item.title: 中国指责荷兰Nexperia公司的举动干扰了芯片供应
item.description: 中国商务部周二表示，在荷兰查封计算机芯片制造商Nexperia之后，中国指责荷兰造成了全球半导体生产和供应链的 "动荡和混乱"。【原文：China has blamed the Netherlands for "turmoil and chaos" in the global semiconductor production and supply chain after the latter seized computer chipmaker Nexperia, the Chinese commerce ministry said on Tuesday.】
